recipe.title: Apple Cider Punch
ingredients: 4 to 6 cups apple cider, or to taste
Garnish: 1 red Delicious apple, halved and sliced thin, and 1 lime, sliced
instructions: In a punch bowl, combine applejack, whiskey, lime juice and apple cider. Stir in cloves. Chill for 1 hour. Add a block of ice or ice cubes. Garnish the punch with apple and lime slices.
